text: Wolfgang-Hubertus Heil (born 3 November 1972) is a German politician of the Social Democratic Party (SPD). He has been the Federal Minister of Labour and Social Affairs since 14 March 2018.Tobias Buck and Guy Chazan (14 March 2018), Germany's new government: who's who in Angela Merkel's cabinet Financial Times. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:German Protestants Category:Living people Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany Category:Labor ministers of Germany Category:Politicians from Lower Saxony
title: Hubertus Heil
